samples.context: If James studies hard for his chemistry exam, he will likely get a good grade. James has been diligently reviewing his notes and practicing problems every night this week. James studies hard for his exam.
samples.question: Will James get a good grade?

samples.context: Whenever Katie follows a recipe precisely, the dish usually turns out well. Katie carefully measured each ingredient and followed all the cooking instructions to prepare her grandmother's lasagna recipe. Katie followed the recipe exactly.
samples.question: Did the lasagna turn out well?

samples.context: If Sam waters his vegetable garden regularly, the plants will be healthy and productive. Sam made sure to thoroughly water the garden twice a week, even in hot weather. Sam waters the garden regularly.
samples.question: Are Sam's vegetable plants healthy and productive?

samples.context: When a company invests in employee training, there is often an increase in productivity. The management dedicated funding to comprehensive training seminars for all new hires. The company invested in employee training.
samples.question: Did productivity increase?

samples.context: If Jenny gets enough sleep, she is usually energetic and focused throughout the day. Last night, Jenny made sure to get to bed early and got a full 8 hours of rest. Jenny got adequate sleep.
samples.question: Is Jenny energetic and focused today?

samples.context: If Alex studies hard for his math test, he will likely get a good grade. Alex has been hitting the books every night to prepare for his big test tomorrow. Alex studies diligently for his math test.
samples.question: Will Alex probably get a good grade?

samples.context: If Jenny consistently shows up on time for work, her boss will be happy with her performance. Jenny makes sure to wake up early and plan her commute so she never arrives late. Jenny is always punctual for her job.
samples.question: Is Jenny's boss satisfied with her timeliness?

samples.context: If Mark eats a healthy diet, he will have more energy throughout the day. Today, Mark opts for oatmeal, fruits, vegetables, and grilled chicken to fuel himself properly. Mark eats nutritious foods.
samples.question: Does Mark tend to feel energetic daily?

samples.context: If the team collaborates effectively, they will create a successful product. During their morning standup, the engineers discussed strategies for working together seamlessly. The team coordinates smoothly.
samples.question: Will the team likely develop a good product?

samples.context: If Sam trains consistently, he has a good chance of qualifying for the marathon. Sam made a schedule to run every morning and evening to build up endurance. Sam trains regularly for the marathon.
samples.question: Does Sam stand a strong possibility of qualifying?
